title: SGM Proposal Schema Contract (GSC)
description: Defines the mandatory structure for System State Transition (SST) proposals, required by GSEP-C L0/PRE for ingress control. Utilizes internal definitions for structural integrity checks.

proposal_id.description: Unique identifier for the proposal (e.g., LAYER-TIMESTAMP-INCREMENTAL_HASH). Must adhere to defined system format.

mandate_type.description: Classification aligning with L1 Policy Veto Logic Module (PVLM) checks.

payload.description: The operational data defining the desired system state transition (SST).

provenance.description: Mandatory audit trail and security attributes (L4 Configuration Trust Audit Log input).

simulation_parameters.description: Optional input set for the Proposal Simulation Engine (PSE) at L2.

resource_budget.description: Monetary/Resource budget request required for CBM (L3) verification against CMO. Replaces budget_request_l3 for clearer semantics.

PayloadDefinition.description: Defines the specific target and content hash for the SST.

target_path.description: Filesystem or database path targeted for modification.

source_content_hash.description: Cryptographic hash of the proposed new content, verified before staging.

log_entry_reference.description: Pointer (hash/UUID) to the full transaction details stored in the Immutable Audit Log (IAL).

ProvenanceDefinition.description: Details the origin and security validation of the proposal.

authentication_signature.description: Digital signature proving integrity and source identity, verified by CTAL.

chain_block_reference.description: Mandatory reference to the anchoring block height and hash on the Governance Chain (for finality checking).
